transcript.title: P.M.NO. 40/1959 GRANT TO ADELAIDE ARTS FESTIVAL COMMITTEE
transcript.content:
P. M. No, 40/ 1959
GRANT TO ADELAIDE ARTS FESTIVAL
COINMITTEE
The Prime Minister announced today that a
Grant of Å“ 7,000. had been given by the Commonwealth
towards the Festival of Arts which is to be held in Adelaid
in 1960. The Prime Minister said that in so doing
the Commonwealth recognised the contribution the Festival
would make in focussing attention on Australian cultural
achievements. Canberra,
22nd October, 1959.
